website_summaries.verdict: Taller adults with larger vehicles will want to try this inflatable bed. It's almost 20 inches longer than most other car mattresses on the market.
pros: Intended for trucks, SUVs, vans, and larger vehicles
Three-way folding design fits into the position of the tires
Comes with carry bag and pump
cons: Must re-inflate if air starts to leak after 10 hours or more of use

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: First of I received used product with bunch of other people’s hair all over it. Second it had holes and the mattress kept loosing air. Ace tee further inspections I’ve noticed that somebody tried to fix it and did a very slappy job. Don’t recommend ether product nor seller!
customer_reviews.author: viktor

customer_reviews.title: but it was really easy to inflate
customer_reviews.text: We've only tested it out at this time, but it was really easy to inflate. I recommend inflating the foot-end first, as it is hard for the pump to reach it if you inflate the rest if it first. It comfortable to lounge on for a while. We are so excited to use it for real. Will update after used at least 3 times.
customer_reviews.author: Katron

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for Drive-in movies
customer_reviews.text: Fit in the bed of my Ram truck for movie night at the local drive-in. Super comfortable and large enough for a family of four.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, nice price
customer_reviews.text: This fit perfect in the back of my 2017 Jeep Grand Cherokee. It was comfortable enough to get a few hours sleep in an airport parking lot for a very early morning flight. It was easy to install and blow up. It’s not very thick so long periods of sleeping on this might hurt your back but way better than not having anything to sleep on. Could be used on the floor if you needed a quick place to sleep also.
customer_reviews.author: Nursejayne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for our SUV
customer_reviews.text: A perfect fit for our 2003 Durango. We slept 3 nights in it. It lost a bit of firmness after the second night so we just added a bit more air with the easy to use pump provided and it was perfect again for the third night.
customer_reviews.author: Kris R. Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: So, I’m now way past my return date. I haven’t even used this air mattress. I put it in my suv and it didn’t fit right. Also, very thin when blown up. I immediately sunk to my trunk. Very frustrating for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Fits Forester
customer_reviews.text: We got this for a winter road trip. The bottom section has a slow leak since receving it that we have been unable to find and is deflated half way through the night. If it weren't for that I would give it 5 stars. It fits our Forester well and the concept is great too. It takes a little time to inflate all of the sections but it is not difficult with the pump provided. The side peices that cover the wheel wells I only fill about half way otherwise there is not enough leg room for two people.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Did the trick!
customer_reviews.text: Took it on a few week road trip and it lasted most of the way until one of the nipples broke off. Enjoyed it while it lasted and might get another since the price is right!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: This fits great, but less than 6 months later two of the sections have unexplained leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Velodious

customer_reviews.title: It deflated pretty quick which was disappointing because it fit perfectly in ...
customer_reviews.text: The plastic where the mattress folds ripped in several places which spread to the air part when used. It deflated pretty quick which was disappointing because it fit perfectly in my car and was really comfortable. Debating if I should get a new diff brand with folds or without now
customer_reviews.author: Karlene

customer_reviews.title: some pockets leak
customer_reviews.text: slow leak in some of the air pockets but there are many and that keeps this useful still
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: comfy
customer_reviews.text: fit in our 2014 xterra perfectly. Very comfortable and packs down small for its size. The carry bag and pump add to its value in a huge way.
customer_reviews.author: JNO-LVX

customer_reviews.title: Went flat.
customer_reviews.text: Fit 2017 Explorer great but went flat during first use.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Crowder

customer_reviews.title: Low quality plastic that tears easily
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of trash. It only lasted a couple days on the first trip I took it on. Not only did it pop, but the plugs tore while simply trying to open them up to let the air out.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McNerney

customer_reviews.title: Too little for big suvs and won’t stay pumped up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in 3 or 4 months back and didn’t get to use it until this weekend ,,filled it up and it went flat before morning both days and how convenient want on warranty anymore ,,I think it would have been ok if it would have not went flat...
customer_reviews.author: Carmack

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would have been great if it didn’t deflate every two hours while sleeping on it. Returned :/
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Loses air
customer_reviews.text: This air mattress got a hole somewhere and I attempted to identify it for over 2 hours and never could find it, even though it was loosing air rapidly. Don’t bother.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Internal seams burst
customer_reviews.text: Seams between air pockets did not hold up and the mattress now has giant bumps that are impossible to sleep on. Really liked it until then, pretty disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth W. Elmore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those trips when car camping is the only ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for those trips when car camping is the only option. You're still sleeping in your car, but the cushion of air helps take the edge off.
customer_reviews.author: Rae Ann

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay inflated
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife and I and finally took it out for our first camping trip and the bottom half won’t stay inflated. Easy to inflate but with the mattress deflating, not so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: ... but I have used it twice and it work great.
customer_reviews.text: Little bit hard to fill all the sections up but I have used it twice and it work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Super thin. Went flat after 4 hours. Complete waste of money. Much better to just buy a twin blow up thats %25 of the price. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: alex arel

customer_reviews.title: Order came really quick. Can't wait to use this ...
customer_reviews.text: Order came really quick. Can't wait to use this im my Jeep Grand Cherokee this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Thin and loses air
customer_reviews.text: Fit well in my jeep compass but very thin and losses are every time we use it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comy sleeping
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Super easy to inflate, stays inflated. Stays in back of jeep patriot
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Sinkiewicz

customer_reviews.title: It states that it comes with an electric car pump ...
customer_reviews.text: It states that it comes with an electric car pump and the pump was not include or a piece to attach to a different air pump, so I have no way to blow it up.
customer_reviews.author: Riley benson

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 2012 RAV4 perfectly. Seems a little hard but I have not slept a night on it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Steven gh

customer_reviews.title: Put in our 2015 Dodge Durango RT. Fit well ...
customer_reviews.text: Put in our 2015 Dodge Durango RT. Fit well. It would fit any SUV. We used it for extra sleeping space when camping.
customer_reviews.author: Justin D

customer_reviews.title: Like that acarry bag and pump were included
customer_reviews.text: Little small for my Chrystler Pacifica and one section popped on the first trip. Like that acarry bag and pump were included.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Mobile Inflation Travel Thicker Back Seat Cushion Air Bed for SUV
product_meta.description:
Operating introduction: 
1, LeiMin car cushion is made of compound, breathable and eco-friendly PVC material, which is non-toxic, smell-less, safe and keep warm at 25 degree centigrade below zero. 
2, Compared with traditional product which is only 25um, our 44um thickness plus material with flocking largely improves your hand feeling just like touching smooth leather. 
3, Certainly, the unique thickness makes the cushion with unbelievable crush resistance and quakeproof characteristic. 
4, The body of cushion is three-piece folding (35-24-12inch) with ten independent compartments connecting with others by 2 holes, plus 2 special design on the position of tires. 
5, It can be applied to nearly 95% of the SUV. 
6, The mattress can be inflated fully and deflated convenient within two minutes. 

Pls note that:
There are two caps inside and outside. The outside cap is for inflating while the inside cap is for losing air. There is no need to open it. If both of the caps are open, then it will lead to the pump not working. 

product size: 
Folded volume: 11x9.4x6 inch 
Unfolded volume: length 71-59 inch; width 51-46.5 inch;thickness: 2-4.7 inch 
Height of pillow: 11.8 inch 
Size：55”×35”×20”
Material：PVC Flocking
Net weight：4.8lb
Color: Green

Attentions: 
1, This product is not a life-saving equipment, it can not be used in the water. 
2, The recommended temperature inside the car is: -13 to 140 H. 
3, Please do not use it to touch any sharp objects or cigarette. 
4, Please tightening the nozzle during inflation process. 
5, The air in the cushion can last about 10 hours. Please inflated it again after 10 hours for a comfortable use. 
6, When using the air pump, the voltage of the vehicle can not be over 12v.

Package includes:
1 car air cushion; 
1 12V car electric air pump; 
1 maintenance package with with 2 patches.
feature_bullets: The maximum size of expansion is: 71*51 inch
Suitable to SUV, MPV, beach, camping, hiking, outdoor, aquatic, etc. Ultra-thin and streamline design, three-piece folding, special design on the position of tires.
The recommended temperature inside the car is from -13 to 140 degree F when in use.
It is a good choice of outdoor recliner or beach chair. Durable car equipment for comfortable travel sleeping for kid and adult, also can create more room for romantic intimate motion in vechicles.
Reversible plus material with double-sided flocking, environment-friendly, cold-resistant.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars41 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
